website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix W100 is a tough, inexpensive camera at a reasonable price, but image quality isn't any better than a good smartphone.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the kids! They can play, explore and learn outside and inside the water.
customer_reviews.author: Dom_Buyer_27

customer_reviews.title: Not very waterproof
customer_reviews.text: In terms of features it wouldn't have been a bad camera; however it let water in on the second morning of use. It misted up and then stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.author: Andy D

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. My six year old took it on holiday and has some really nice photos. It's also complex enough for experienced photographers who want a quick photo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael56J

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and great when the weather is wet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of use, how light the camera is and that it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: AndyL15

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Coolpix camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment, for adults but very easy to use. My 4 year old grandson can operate it easily.
customer_reviews.author: MR STEPHEN NIGHTINGALE

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old niece who has caught the photography bug. Very easy to use and can handle being knocked about. A few options to experiment which is why I opted for this over the toyish cameras... My niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie Kennedy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: this camera ❤️❤️❤️ I made some experiments with it and i am really really happy about the result , for those who want, I can post a link I totally recommend it! you can do so much with it, considering it's not a professional camera
customer_reviews.author: oana ancuta briciu

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Good communication with seller, fast delivery, good quality. Camera is waterproof, everything works fine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Przybylski

customer_reviews.title: Screen not working after few weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for Christmas within a month of having it the screen went black. Because I was too busy with the New Year I wasn't able to ask for a replacement. I don't if we handled it badly, I doubt that, but in case not very solid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pairing problems
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and in good condition.I haven't fully explored all the functions of the camera yet. I have been preoccupied with trying to set up the WiFi pairing. The main reason I bought the coolpix was the ability to pair it with my phone and thus send photos instantly to Facebook. I have followed the instructions to the letter but they have not paired! To be fair, the Nikon helpdesk have been trying to assist me, but it is difficult to explain the problems in back and forth emails. I have viewed video instructions, and the process looks ostensibly straightforward. In reality it is anything but, for me anyway. Mightily frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: A completely useless bit of kit. On its first day out of its box the shutter button failed to work. The few photos that it took before it gave up the ghost were of appalling quality. So disappointing because I bought this to take on caving trips, having used a reliable Nikon Coolpix S3200 for a few years. Unfortunately that one inevitably got wet once too often. On discussing this with two friends, I found that both had also tried the W100, and they had also returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Custard

customer_reviews.title: ... previous reviews and went for this one as it's easy for the kids to use
customer_reviews.text: Ignored the previous reviews and went for this one as it's easy for the kids to use. Really bad design, moisture got into it straight away and started misting up photos and screen, even the sound from videos was distorted. If you want a waterproof camera you need to spend a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Dechristi

customer_reviews.title: nikonw100 camera
customer_reviews.text: camera hardly used has developed a problem will not accept pictures on any sd card will only take 3 pictures before memory full message appears need to retun to nikon service dept
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad camera but not tested under water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Candid!
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, especially for kids or beginners as you can take everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: ... the camera for my Grandaughter she thought it was great and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera for my Grandaughter she thought it was great and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, it's a NIKON!
customer_reviews.text: What a camera. Technology has come on leaps and bounds. It's shock proof, waterproof, excellent photo quality 13mB, what more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Useless intsructions
customer_reviews.text: Camera is fine but, and a big BUT, the instructions were not in English and therefore useless in an English speaking market. It shouldn't be necessary to have to download English instructions. If you want to print for reference when you first go out with the camera the printout takes too much paper and bulk. Highly impractical and disappointing for intelligent granddaughter who wanted to work it out for herself. Shoddy service from the importer.
customer_reviews.author: NR16

customer_reviews.title: Nikon customer service very poor
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish camera not fit for purpose I was sent a replacement camera and this developed the same problem took two pictures then the same message appeared on the screen 'out of memory' then this one would not function either.
customer_reviews.author: Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, easy to use and attractive for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, easy to use and attractive for a child. "Snapbridge" is difficult to set up and slow to work, but cable link offers practical alternative for the download of photographs.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Brought for a family holiday and paid for next day delivery at one of the drop off locations. This was great as I could go and pick it up any time I was able to. The yellow colour is fantastic and the camera itself works perfectly. Its very easy to use, and the quality was better than I expected. Would defiantly recommend this product for any families or anyone wanting a simple and high quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Item bought for my son's Xmas he is always making videos for YouTube. He will love this camera what I like most is it's tough so I don't have to worry he might drop it. Item arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: manda T

customer_reviews.title: This camera is very basic and more of a toy ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very basic and more of a toy than a serious camera. We tried to return for a refund and were told it would be collected the next working day (a week ago!).
customer_reviews.author: Anna H

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return it as it is still under warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second camera we have received and it has exactly the same fault as the previous one. I would like to return it as it is still under warranty but it is impossible to contact anyone to carry this out. Please can someone contact me as soon as possible. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No English instructions
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on the product yet but it will be a struggle to use as NONE of the instructions are in ENGLISH !!!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Not up to a small drop onto dry grass.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered Sat PM, travelled Sunday. Took it out Monday. It was dropped accidentally from hip height to the grass and Smashed the lens. Would like to return it but having issues with Amazon and Labels expiring while i'm on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: SteveONZ

customer_reviews.title: Used for Holidays
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice looking Camera Zoom is excellent and takes nice clear photos on Auto mode
customer_reviews.author: AP Lalor

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof camera for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son uses this camera and takes pretty good pictures and videos with it. He can zoom in and out easily and watch a slideshow of his pictures. It's been dropped many times, charged many times over the last couple of years and we've never had a problem with it. I use it when I go snorkelling and although it can be tricky to focus I've taken some decent shots of fish and plant life. I think it's a brilliant camera and I'll probably buy one for my daughter when she's old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Waring

customer_reviews.title: ... as going on holiday soon and it won't charge brilliant no time too sort it out too not happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as my Christmas present just gone too charge it as going on holiday soon and it won't charge brilliant no time too sort it out too not happy must be faulty ... has anyone else had this problem ??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX W100 Camera - Blue
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlueYou can swim or dive with it as deep as 10m underwater, plus it’s shockproof to 1.8m, cold-resistant to -10oC and dustproof, so it can be carried anywhere without a care. Shoot high-quality photos and share instantly with SnapBridge, which automatically transfers images to your smart device for easy storage and social sharing while on the go. Utilising Bluetooth5 low energy (BLE) technology, SnapBridge maintains a constant, low-power connection between your COOLPIX W100 and your smartphone or tablet, to give you easy control over your photographic life. Full HD movies (1080p) with stereo sound are recorded at the touch of a button, with Electronic VR (Vibration Reduction) keeping videos smooth and clear. Incredibly simple to operate, the COOLPIX W100 has dedicated one-touch buttons and an easy-to-use interface, plus a special children’s menu making it suitable for photographers of all ages. Select Easy auto mode to let your camera optimise all its settings for you, giving you great images every time, and you can frame shots clearly with the 230k-dot 6.7cm/2.7in TFT LCD monitor – even in low light or direct sunlight. Perfect portraits have never been easier both above and underwater. The Smart portrait system activates features like Face-priority AF, which automatically detects your subject’s facial area and focuses on it, whilst the Underwater face framing takes shots automatically when it detects people’s faces in the sea or pool.LD-1000 LED Movie Light.

BOX CONTAINS
COOLPIX W100 CameraCamera StrapEN-EL19 Rechargeable Li-ion BatteryEH-73P Charging AC AdapterUC-E21 USB CableEuropean Service Warranty Card
feature_bullets: COOLPIX W100 Camera Camera Strap EN-EL19 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery EH-73P Charging AC Adapter UC-E21 USB Cable European Service Warranty Card
Monitor Type is Thin Film Transistor Liquid Crystal Display with Anti-reflection coating 5 level brightness adjustment

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
